```scss
// Property: keyboardDismissMode
// Component(s): Ti.UI.ListView, Ti.UI.ScrollView
'.keyboard-dismiss-mode-none': { keyboardDismissMode: Ti.UI.iOS.KEYBOARD_DISMISS_MODE_NONE }
'.keyboard-dismiss-mode-on-drag': { keyboardDismissMode: Ti.UI.iOS.KEYBOARD_DISMISS_MODE_ON_DRAG }
'.keyboard-dismiss-mode-interactive': { keyboardDismissMode: Ti.UI.iOS.KEYBOARD_DISMISS_MODE_INTERACTIVE }
```
